sprint_goal: Implement the full user identity lifecycle, including registration with verification, login/logout with secure session management, and core profile management with photo uploads.
epic_coverage: Core Identity & Access Management (IAM), User Profile Management
key_deliverables: Functional user registration, email verification, login, and logout. Basic profile creation with image upload capability.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate a user registering, verifying their email, logging in, uploading a profile picture, and logging out.
success_criteria: All IAM E2E tests passing in CI. Profile page displays and updates basic info and images. No critical security vulnerabilities identified in IAM logic.
risk_factors: Complexity of secure JWT session management (RISK-006). Security misconfiguration of S3 pre-signed URLs.
mitigation_strategies: Mandatory security code reviews for all IAM and S3-related code. Use of established security libraries (Passport.js, AWS SDK).
external_dependencies: AWS SES, S3, and Redis must be provisioned and accessible.
integration_windows: Continuous integration testing throughout the sprint.
burndown_target: Linear burndown from 27 story points to 0.

sprint_goal: Enable secure, self-service account recovery and build out a comprehensive user profile by adding work experience and education history management.
epic_coverage: Core Identity & Access Management (IAM), User Profile Management
key_deliverables: Functional password reset flow. Account deactivation/reactivation. Full CRUD for Work Experience and Education profile sections.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate requesting and using a password reset link. Demonstrate deactivating an account and reactivating it by logging in. Show adding, editing, and deleting work/education entries.
success_criteria: All E2E tests for password reset and profile CRUD passing in CI. All acceptance criteria for included stories are met.
risk_factors: Complexity of secure token management for password reset. Flaky E2E tests for time-sensitive features (RISK-004).
mitigation_strategies: Use a mail-trapping service for reliable E2E email testing. Thorough integration testing of the password reset token lifecycle.
external_dependencies: AWS SES for password reset emails.
burndown_target: Linear burndown from 24 story points to 0.
